name: Shotty Jump
description:
ATTENTION:

After the GameJam is finished, I'll fix a few of the issues with time resetting, getting stuck in walls and the end boss sucking.  And also this page.

You are one man with his trusty shotgun trying to find the ghost king. He probably stole one of those chips at the bottom of your fast food bag, you know the one right? You'll have to hunt him down and kill him and then the games over. 

You need to shoot your way around the game trying not to die. There are some hard parts but we made it forgiving (not really).  Once you beat the game you can try speed running it, if you do post your time in the comments!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move right

Jump - Shoot at floor

Extra Jump - You earn an extra jump by collecting the floating shells, but you will lose the jump if you touch anything and you don't shoot.

Shoot - Left Mouse

Music:
